Params: {2: 'Soldier', 3: "Are... are you sure that you don't need a filter?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "And it's not your duty to take care of me. Just tell me what you've got.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola was silent for a moment, as if he was hiding his relief from the others.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You, you, and you, come with me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola and his fellow team members went over the ruins built on Corrupted corpses and broken walls laboriously.'}
{3: 'At the top of the ruins, Lucia was standing still silently—she had run out of energy...'}
{3: 'Her long black hair, along with a few tags in her clenched fist, are the only things swaying in the warm wind...'}
{3: 'The two bodies lying in front of Lucia used to be her teammates, who were both defeated by her.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Very close to the critical value, but not yet exceeded it.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola bypassed Lucia who was holding a blade, and crouched to check the two Constructs.'}
{3: 'The Inver-Devices of the two Constructs were destroyed by guns. In fact, they were fully corrupted by the virus before being defeated by Lucia.'}
{3: 'He also found the lower part of an artificial limb holding a pistol, with a very neat transection.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "How's the searching on the low Earth orbit going?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "We've found the drop pod for emergency lift-off floating aimlessly... The recycling has been commenced.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Things that happened here and are going to happen are the top-secret of Humanity, understand?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Now tell the Purifying Force not to purify this whole area.', 4: '1'}
